#Bread #Loaves of 2020

#Bread #Loaves of 2020! I started learning #Sourdough techniques from @frenchguycooking , then gratuated to a NYT recipe written by @csaffitz , then read the Tartine Bread book which taught me a lot. My loaves come out pretty well though sometimes I have some bummers. It has been a fun way to pass the socially distant times ð
